thread.section_title: DesignCrowd Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DesignCrowd | designcrowd.com
thread.title: Mimi

author: Mimi
title: Mimi
text: Thank you DesignCrowd for a business experience that FAR exceeded my expectations. I used your logo design services which rendered several design choices from various graphic designers. The designer that I went with was incredible. I knew what I was looking for but could not visualize it. This designer (Graphicancers) put into reality exactly what I requested and visualized. I will DEFINITELY" be using additional services from your organization and highly recommend your organization.
